name: LOOSEPO_SNOWCLASH
description:
This is a game about driving a bumper car in the snow to sprint and hit the enemy. At present, only the game mechanism of the challenge mode has been completed. You need to constantly hit the incoming enemy to the dead area on the edge of the scene. (recommended to play with a gamepad).

这是一款在雪地驾驶碰碰车冲刺并撞击敌人的游戏，目前只完成了挑战模式的游戏机制，你需要不断的将来袭的敌人撞击至场景边缘的死亡区域。（建议使用手柄游玩）。

Keyboard operation: A-turn left D-turn right J-sprint K-throttle

Gamepad operation: left joystick to control steering A key accelerator X key sprint

键盘操作：A-左转 D-右转 J-冲刺 K-油门

手柄操作：左摇杆控制转向 A键油门 X键冲刺
